verses.roman:
choṭa-vipra bale,--"tomāra strī-putra saba
bahu jñāti-goṣṭhī tomāra bahuta bāndhava

synonyms: choṭa-vipra—the young brāhmaṇa; bale—says; tomāra—your; strī-putra—wife and sons; saba—all; bahu—many; jñāti—of family relations; goṣṭhī—group; tomāra—your; bahuta—many; bāndhava—friends.
translation: The young brāhmaṇa said, "You have a wife and sons, and you have a large circle of relatives and friends.
